verses.verse: Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; For he is good <WH2896>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto the God <WH430> of gods <WH430>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto the Lord <WH113> of lords <WH113>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him who alone doeth <WH6213> great <WH1419> wonders <WH6381>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him that by understanding <WH8394> made <WH6213> the heavens <WH8064>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him that spread forth <WH7554> the earth <WH776> above the waters <WH4325>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him that made <WH6213> great <WH1419> lights <WH216>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
The sun <WH8121> to rule <WH4475> by day <WH3117>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
The moon <WH3394> and stars <WH3556> to rule <WH4475> by night <WH3915>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him that smote <WH5221> Egypt <WH4714> in their first-born <WH1060>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
And brought out <WH3318> Israel <WH3478> from among <WH8432> them <WH2617>; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever <WH5769>;
With a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with an outstretched <WH5186> arm <WH2220>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him that divided <WH1504> the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220> in sunder <WH1506>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
And made Israel <WH3478> to pass through <WH5674> the midst <WH8432> of it <WH2617>; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever <WH5769>;
But overthrew <WH5287> Pharaoh <WH6547> and his host <WH2428> in the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him that led <WH3212> his people <WH5971> through the wilderness <WH4057>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
To him that smote <WH5221> great <WH1419> kings <WH4428>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
And slew <WH2026> famous <WH117> kings <WH4428>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
And Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
And gave <WH5414> their land <WH776> for a heritage <WH5159>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
Even a heritage <WH5159> unto Israel <WH3478> his servant <WH5650>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
Who remembered <WH2142> us in our low estate <WH8216>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;
And hath delivered <WH6561> us from our adversaries <WH6862>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>:
Who giveth <WH5414> food <WH3899> to all flesh <WH1320>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto the God <WH410> of heaven <WH8064>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
